title: Another Year
snippet: Hello there! You seem interested in what I have to share!I wouldn’t say it was a bad year, but it was a very different year altogether. title: Devlogs for Strange Little Dreams
snippet: Welcome! You seem interested in the development of Strange Little Dreams!Strange Little Dreams will be my first game project. It will be a story driven game, wherein the player will have to take the role of a character and make decisions that will ultimately end in different ways!Devlog Links:Dev...

title: Study Buddy!
snippet: The main goal of Study Buddy is to help students like me to study much better! The idea of Study Buddy is students make templates for let’s say a quiz, homework or basically a reviewer, in where the software mixes these questions and throws it back to you.This should also feature cross-platform a...

title: What a year! 2020 Here I come
snippet: Hey there! Seems like you’re interested in what I want to share :DLet me start off by saying thank you for being interested in what I want to share!
